name: Maze Paths
description:
A small demo created in the Complete C# Unity Game Developer 2D course.

A simulation that identifies the absolute dead ends and the possible paths (direct and indirect) to the specified location in the maze.

Controls:

Enter - Next level

Backspace - Previous Level

There are 3 different levels

Cyan - possible paths (direct and indirect)

Purple - absolute dead ends

Use case:

Can be used to map out a world for your game. You will be able to identify which paths in your world lead to dead ends and which don't.

Access the project create your own mazes that can represent the map of your worlds in your other games!

Media:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTdmzb6c9vzxw_Z4vgPRKyw

Access Project:
